name: invio
description: Invio is a self hosted URL shortener and branded link management service. It generates short links, tracks clicks and referrers, and provides a minimal dashboard so teams can manage campaigns without relying on third party link platforms.
features: URL Shortening: Create short, memorable links for long URLs.
Click Analytics: Track clicks, referrers, and geographic data for each link.
Branded Links: Use custom domains for professional, branded short URLs.
Link Management: Edit, disable, or delete links from a centralized dashboard.
QR Code Generation: Automatically generate QR codes for each shortened link.
Campaign Tracking: Organize links by campaign for marketing analytics.
API Access: Programmatically create and manage links via REST API.
Self-Hosted Privacy: Keep all link data and analytics on your own infrastructure.
